This will save your client setting to the tv server
This will load your client setting from the tv server
Save/Load Client Settings on/from Tv Server

Configure the filter settings. All selected items will be enabled for editing of a tvwish. Disabled items will use the default values.
Select the filter items you want to edit
Unselected items cannot be edited for a Tv wish and will use the default
Resetting to default values will overwrite all fields on all tabs and also overwrite your personal defined default values - do you wish to continue?
Configure the defaults settings. This will use for each new tvwish the selected defaults. Disabled items will get the default values assigned.
Configure the format settings. Empty formats will use the formats defined in the language files
Formats should be changed by experts only. Empty fields will use defaults from the language file
Formats should be changed by experts only.
Empty fields will use defaults from the language file.
